title: Ornament help
content:
Does anyone know from where this ornament (arrowed) is from, i've had people tell me its from a Bodoni ornament set but i cant find it-

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140806193327im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HBLCt_4505.jpg)

thanks in advance for any help
author: Dash_X

comments.content:
It's an ampersand.

Don't know from were it came though.
